body.name: Snowed In at the Ranch & A Kiss on Crimson Ranch: A Christmas Romance Novel
body.description: BESTSELLING AUTHOR COLLECTIONReader-favorite romances in collectible volumes from our bestselling authors.Snowed in at the Ranch by New York Times bestselling author RaeAnne Thayne, previously published as Intimate SurrenderAfter a night of champagne-fueled recklessness, Katie Crosby is secretly pregnant with the child of big-time businessman Peter Logan. And when their covert hookup becomes major tabloid fodder, Katie escapes to her family's remote Wyoming ranch, hoping the whole ordeal will blow over and Peter will never find her.Unfortunately, Peter shows up at the ranch anyway, not accepting Katie's silence…and a blizzard snows them both in, forcing Peter to stay. Learning he'll be a father for the first time, Peter realizes this new family is more important to him than any business transaction, but he'll have to convince Katie his love is forever first.FREE BONUS STORY INCLUDED IN THIS VOLUME!A Kiss on Crimson Ranch by USA TODAY bestselling author Michelle MajorAfter a dead-end career in Hollywood, Sara Wellens plans to sell her half of the guest ranch she inherited in Crimson, Colorado. But when her property partner turns out to be handsome single dad Josh Travers, Sara is surprised at how quickly she bonds with the charming cowboy and his daughter.Previously published Read more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Two great stories in one book. Excellent!
reviews.reviewText: Two books in one from great authors. Snowed in at the Ranch & A Kiss on Crimson Ranch. RaeAnne Thayne takes her readers to a snowed in ranch with people who have secrets. One of the secrets is an unplanned pregnancy, how it is announced and the forever life they want. Michelle Major, author of the second great story, is filled with angst over a failed career as an actress, an inheritance that gets everyone's attention and a young girl who bonds with the actress in a mother/daughter way. Both books are great and made my reading over the holidays filled with smiles, laughs and a few tears. Thanks for a Merry Christmas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great small town romance
reviews.reviewText: These are two great quick reads and ones you will enjoy. Snowed in at the Ranch involves Katie Crosby and Peter Logan whose families have a standing feud going on. Yet due to a one night encounter leads to a whole lot of issues for both of them. You will enjoy the story line and the characters. Whereas Kiss on Crimson Ranch goes in a different line. It is also a good quick read with fun characters. Here you have actress Sara Wells inheriting her Grandmothers house and meeting Josh and his Daughter Claire. Both Sara and Josh have trust issues and learn how to deal with them. You can read both stories in a day and have a good time losing yourself in their stories

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Both authors have written great stories. Both are Christmas romances with good characters & great conversations. “Snowed In At The Ranch” is about someone not using her real name& then a pregnancy shows up! “A Kiss on CrimsonRanch” is about a former TV star who inherits her grandmother’s ranch. She meets the owner of the rest of the property & works with him to give him time in order to raise money to buy the house that has always been part of the ranch until Sara’s grandma died. A relationship starts with Josh, the ranch owner; and add to that a teenage daughter of Josh’s who he barely know but is now living with him! Definitely both books are great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A kiss on Crimson Ranch
reviews.reviewText: I truly enjoyed both stories. That's is one of my favorite authirs. I will also look for more stories by Michelle Major. Two great books!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This review is for Snowed In at the Ranch
reviews.reviewText: This review is for Snowed In at the Ranch. I started A Kiss on Crimson Ranch but couldn't get into it. I'd just finished one book with a malicious mother, so I didn’t want to read about another. I have several books of RT, and enjoyed them. I liked this one, too. Good enemies to lovers read.

reviews.reviewText: Book was a great story and fun to read while at home. Thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Reprint under a different Title
reviews.reviewText: I liked the story. However I liked it the first time I read it too, under the name Snowbound in Sweetwater Ranch. I looked carefully at the description of this title and no mention was made of it being a reprint of Snowbound ….
